ABBR	Abbreviation, Abbreviation, Abbreviate, Abbreviated
ENTY	Entity, Identity, Identity, Identity
DESC	Description and abstract concept, Comprehension, Interpretation, Expressing
HUM	Human being, Homo floresiensis, Person, Homo sapiens anatomy
LOC	Location, Geolocation, Location, Geographic coordinates
NUM	Numeric value, Numeric sequence, Numeric scale, Numeric representation
